Title: Confectioner Directing a Parrot to Watch his Unfaithful Wife
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: On this folio from Walters manuscript W.662, a confectioner is shown directing a parrot to keep watch over his unfaithful wife. The inscription above the door reads: al-sultan (the ruler).
Keywords: Islamic; Ottoman; Turkish; Book; Codex; Headpiece; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Miniature; Painting; Turkey; History
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Muhammad ibn 'Ali Katib al-Samarqandi
